title: Unite Into One

tokens.lyric: Chase away the power of Satan,

lines.raw: [A]Chase away the power of Satan,

tokens.lyric: Far away beyond the land and sea;

lines.raw: [A]Far away beyond the land and sea;

tokens.lyric: Build for God a boundless Kingdom,

lines.raw: [A]Build for God a boundless Kingdom,

tokens.lyric: Giving joy and liberty to all.

lines.raw: [E7]Giving joy and liberty to all.

tokens.lyric: Come, ye people all around the world, let's
unite into
one;

lines.raw: [E7]Come, ye people all around the world, let's [A]unite into [D]one;

tokens.lyric: Spreading forth the glory of the Father,

lines.raw: [A]Spreading forth the glory of the Father,

tokens.lyric: And His great will forevermore.

lines.raw: [A]And His great will forevermore.

tokens.lyric: Unite, Unite, let's unite into one

lines.raw: [A]Unite, Unite, let's unite into one

tokens.lyric: Bring about one nation uniting all the people of the world.

lines.raw: [A]Bring about one nation uniting all the people of the world.

tokens.lyric: Raise the white cross on our banner,

lines.raw: [A]Raise the white cross on our banner,

tokens.lyric: High upon Mt. Everest it waves;

lines.raw: [A]High upon Mt. Everest it waves;

tokens.lyric: In the blue Pacific waters,

lines.raw: [A]In the blue Pacific waters,

tokens.lyric: Cleanse the sword that brought the victory.

lines.raw: [E7]Cleanse the sword that brought the victory.

tokens.lyric: Come, ye people all around the world, let's
unite into
one. Now

lines.raw: [E7]Come, ye people all around the world, let's [A]unite into [D]one. Now

tokens.lyric: resolve to end the deep resentment, of the long centuries past.

lines.raw: [A]resolve to end the deep resentment, of the long centuries past.

tokens.lyric: Build a fortress to defend the peace,

lines.raw: [A]Build a fortress to defend the peace,

tokens.lyric: On the great new heaven and new earth;

lines.raw: [E7]On the great new heaven and new earth;

tokens.lyric: We will all sing 'Hallelujah,'

lines.raw: [A]We will all sing 'Hallelujah,'

tokens.lyric: Safe within the bosom of the Lord.

lines.raw: [A]Safe within the bosom of the Lord.

tokens.lyric: Come, ye people all around the world, let's unite into one.

lines.raw: [A]Come, ye people all around the world, let's unite into one.

tokens.lyric: Share the joy and glory of Heaven, hidden so long from every eye.

lines.raw: [E7]Share the joy and glory of Heaven, hidden so long from every eye.
